Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Irving Park/Nashville
ShortDescription: Westbound 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett and Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Nashville.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
